EventItemActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
EventItemTitle: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of the Southern Boulevard business improvement district.
EventItemMatterName: Establishment of the Southern Boulevard business improvement district.

EventItemTitle: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

EventItemActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
EventItemTitle: Resolution concerning the increase in the annual expenditure for the Times Square, the 34th Street, the Lower East Side, the Fifth Avenue, the Fashion Center, the Grand Street, the 125th Street, the White Plains Road, the East Mid-Manhattan, and the Myrtle Avenue Brooklyn Business Improvement Districts, and the Fulton Mall Special Assessment District, and the setting of the time and place for the hearing of the local law increasing the annual expenditure for such districts.
EventItemMatterName: Authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended in ten business improvement districts and one special assessment district.

EventItemActionText: This Resolution was Amendment Proposed by Comm
EventItemTitle: Resolution concerning the increase in the annual expenditure for the Times Square, the 34th Street, the Lower East Side, the Fifth Avenue, the Fashion Center, the Grand Street, the 125th Street, the White Plains Road, the East Mid-Manhattan, and the Myrtle Avenue Brooklyn Business Improvement Districts, and the Fulton Mall Special Assessment District, and the setting of the time and place for the hearing of the local law increasing the annual expenditure for such districts.
EventItemMatterName: Authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended in ten business improvement districts and one special assessment district.

EventItemActionText: This Resolution was Amended by Committee
EventItemTitle: Resolution concerning the increase in the annual expenditure for the Times Square, the 34th Street, the Lower East Side, the Fifth Avenue, the Fashion Center, the Grand Street, the 125th Street, the White Plains Road, the East Mid-Manhattan, and the Myrtle Avenue Brooklyn Business Improvement Districts, and the Fulton Mall Special Assessment District, and the setting of the time and place for the hearing of the local law increasing the annual expenditure for such districts.
EventItemMatterName: Authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended in ten business improvement districts and one special assessment district.

EventItemActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
EventItemTitle: Resolution concerning the increase in the annual expenditure for the Times Square, the 34th Street, the Lower East Side, the Fifth Avenue, the Fashion Center, the Grand Street, the 125th Street, the White Plains Road, the East Mid-Manhattan, and the Myrtle Avenue Brooklyn Business Improvement Districts, and the Fulton Mall Special Assessment District, and the setting of the time and place for the hearing of the local law increasing the annual expenditure for such districts.
EventItemMatterName: Authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended in ten business improvement districts and one special assessment district.

EventItemActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
EventItemTitle: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of the Southern Boulevard business improvement district.
EventItemMatterName: Establishment of the Southern Boulevard business improvement district.

EventItemActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
EventItemTitle: A Local Law to amend the charter of the city of New York, in relation to tax appeals and the creation of an office of administrative tax appeals composed of the tax commission and the tax appeals tribunal; and to repeal a provision of the charter of the city of New York relating to the tax appeals tribunal.
EventItemMatterName: In relation to tax appeals and the creation of an office of administrative tax appeals composed of the tax commission and the tax appeals tribunal.

EventItemActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
EventItemTitle: A Local Law to amend the charter of the city of New York, in relation to tax appeals and the creation of an office of administrative tax appeals composed of the tax commission and the tax appeals tribunal; and to repeal a provision of the charter of the city of New York relating to the tax appeals tribunal.
EventItemMatterName: In relation to tax appeals and the creation of an office of administrative tax appeals composed of the tax commission and the tax appeals tribunal.

EventItemActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
EventItemActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
EventItemTitle: Resolution endorsing the Speaker’s decision to file, on behalf of the Council, an amicus brief in support of the Plaintiffs in the litigation between several states and the federal government captioned New York v. U.S. Department of Health and Human Services, for the purpose of supporting the wide latitude granted to states by the State Children’s Health Insurance Program (“SCHIP”) to set their own income rules for SCHIP eligibility.
EventItemMatterName: Speaker’s decision to file, on behalf of the Council, an amicus brief in support of the Plaintiffs in the litigation between several states and the federal government captioned New York v. U.S. Department of Health and Human Services.

EventItemActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee
EventItemTitle: A Local Law to amend the charter of the city of New York, in relation to tax appeals and the creation of an office of administrative tax appeals composed of the tax commission and the tax appeals tribunal; and to repeal a provision of the charter of the city of New York relating to the tax appeals tribunal.
EventItemMatterName: In relation to tax appeals and the creation of an office of administrative tax appeals composed of the tax commission and the tax appeals tribunal.

EventItemActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
EventItemTitle: A Local Law to amend the charter of the city of New York, in relation to tax appeals and the creation of an office of administrative tax appeals composed of the tax commission and the tax appeals tribunal; and to repeal a provision of the charter of the city of New York relating to the tax appeals tribunal.
EventItemMatterName: In relation to tax appeals and the creation of an office of administrative tax appeals composed of the tax commission and the tax appeals tribunal.

EventItemActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
EventItemTitle: Resolution endorsing the Speaker’s decision to file, on behalf of the Council, an amicus brief in support of the Plaintiffs in the litigation between several states and the federal government captioned New York v. U.S. Department of Health and Human Services, for the purpose of supporting the wide latitude granted to states by the State Children’s Health Insurance Program (“SCHIP”) to set their own income rules for SCHIP eligibility.
EventItemMatterName: Speaker’s decision to file, on behalf of the Council, an amicus brief in support of the Plaintiffs in the litigation between several states and the federal government captioned New York v. U.S. Department of Health and Human Services.
